alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 9:58AM CST until January 31 at 4:55PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Louisiana... Neches River Near Town Bluff Neches River at Neches River Saltwater Barrier Pine Island Bayou Near Sour Lake Sabine River Near Deweyville Neches River Near Evadale For the Sabine River...including Deweyville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Neches River...including Town Bluff, Evadale, Neches River Saltwater Barrier...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Pine Island Bayou...including Sour Lake...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 1000 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neches River near Town Bluff. * WHEN...Until Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 70.0 feet, Flooding can be expected around Barlow Lake and Brushy Lake with some roads being cutoff and some of the lowest properties near the river begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 66.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 68.9 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 68.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
